zone.line: The Earth
How canst thou hear
Who knowest not the language of the dead?
I d Prometheus
Thou art a living spirit -- speak as they
The Earth
I dare not speak like life, lest Heaven's fierce King
Should hear, & link me to some wheel of pain
More torturing than the one whereon I roll.--
Subtle thou art & good, & tho' the Gods
Hear not this voice -- yet thou art more than
God
Being wise & kind -- earnestly hearken now--
Prometheus
Obscurely through my brain like shadows dim
Sweep awful thoughts rapid & thick--I feel
Faint, like one mingled in entwining love,
Yet 'tis not pleasure
The Earth
No, thou canst not hear
Thou art immortal, & this tongue is known
Only to those who die ... I am the Earth
